https://indieweb.org/Webflow

{{stub}}

'''<dfn>[http://webflow.com Webflow]</dfn>''' is a website design tool that can output auto-generated html/css/js for a simple [[static site]].

== See Also ==

* Criticism: [[Chrome]] only web app that requires [[JS]]. Used to support Firefox but then they explicitly disabled it due to a scrollbar styling issues apparently. [https://chat.indieweb.org/2017-05-08#t1494285657480000]
